data.title: Lived up to the hype
data.text: My stepmother, an excellent chef herself, recommended this place to me. I had the peach cobbler smoothie & the lobster salad grilled cheese. Both were incredible! The service was top-notch as well. The two women behind the counter were very friendly. I can't wait to go back next time I'm in Ocala!

data.title: Vegetarian style
data.text: I love the fresh food, enjoyed the tomatoes, and the fresh spinach, a dash of oregano , fresh shredded carrots, and more.  love the fresh taste, all cut fresh, none bagged.

data.title: Yes healthy food can taste great
data.text: The staff was friendly and helpful. Sandwiches were healthy and delicious. Will differently go back soon.

owner_response.author: Liza R, Owner at Good 4 You Cafe, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for visiting and reviewing Ralph - we appreciate you.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: A Must Try!
data.text: This place is healthy, fresh, friendly, and quaint.  I LOVE the tuna melt!!  I wish that it were open on Saturdays too since I only have a 30 minute lunch during the week and very rarely have time to go here, but know that they need time off and rest too.  I have my husband pick up lunch from this place as a treat for my daughter's teacher's birthdays.  They love it too!

owner_response.author: Liza R, Owner at Good 4 You Cafe, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for the complement and for trying us. We look forward to seeing you again. Liza
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Fantastic healthy  lunch!
data.text: The food and the service here is superb. My husband had a turkey burger and the avocado, tomatoes and all ingredients were fresh and tasty. I had a salad that was filling and delicious. Their dressings complete the dishes!  It's obvious that the beautiful twin sisters / owners take a lot of pride in their food and atmosphere. There is an outdoor eating space in the back that is relaxing and comfortable if you prefer to be outside (which we do!).

owner_response.author: Liza R, Owner at Good 4 You Cafe, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for the review - We really appreciate the compliment and love having you visit. Healthy Food is our passion.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Tasty and healthy
data.text: Food is local and fresh.  The mayo has a wonderful taste.  I tried the tuna melt pita and the apple Panini, plus the chicken salad.  All very tasty.  I went twice with friends, and once with my husband when they were recently open on the weekend because of a local art show.

owner_response.author: Liza R, Owner at Good 4 You Cafe, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for the review - we appreciate the feedback! See you soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Healthy Food
data.text: Had Chicken Salad Sandwich, It was GREAT !!!!!!  Never had a Chicken Salad like that before... The smoothies were the BOMB !!!

owner_response.author: Liza R, Owner at Good 4 You Cafe, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for the feedback - We loved your visit. Please come again
owner_response.title: Owner Response
